entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 5:23AM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Areas of Dense Fog This Morning... Areas of dense fog will affect the morning commute. Be alert for rapid changes in visibility in short distances, to below a quarter mile or less in some spots. Slow down, use low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance between your vehicle and the one ahead of you when encountering areas of fog.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 4:30AM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Areas of Dense Fog This Morning... Areas of dense fog, especially near rivers and lakes, will affect the morning commute. entry.title: Dense Fog Advisory issued September 11 at 1:40AM EDT until September 11 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of northwest North Carolina, southwest Virginia and southeast West Virginia. This includes I-77 through Fancy Gap. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EDT this morning.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Eastern Greenbrier; Mercer; Monroe; Summers; Western Greenbrier
